channel.title: Fixing Something

item.title: Fixing Something
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

No, you got it wrong.

if(playerismember == 1 || playerIsMember > 3)
    out.write(12);
if(playerRights > 2)
    out.write(2);
else
    out.write(playerRights);

Wait, if you have:
if(playerId == -1) out.write(7);
else out.write(returnCode);

then put:

if(playerismember == 1 || playerIsMember > 3)
returncode = 12;

above that.

If you’re still having trouble, you can send me your client class and I’ll fix it up for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Fixing Something
item.dc:creator: @_mpire £mpire
item.description:
@_mpire wrote:

In my server’s client.java i have this…

out.write(playerRights); if (playerIsMember > 3){ out.write(12); } if (playerismember == 1) { disconnected == true; out.write(12); outStream.createFrame(109); outloggedIn = false; }

But They Can Still Login!

Read full topic

item.title: Fixing Something
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

if (playerIsMember > 3)
out.write(12);

Should go above:

out.write(playerRights);

Read full topic

item.description:
@_mpire wrote:

Wait explain again what should be above what sorry im just really frustraited.

item.title: Fixing Something
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

outStream.createFrame(109);

[quote=“£mpire, post:1, topic:234682”]In my client there is this

if(k == 12) { loginMessage1 = "You need a members account to login to this world."; loginMessage2 = "Please subscribe, or use a different world."; return; }

How could i make my server make them get that message?

i already got

if (playerIsMember > 3) {

now i need to get them to get that message?[/quote]
By the way, that should be above out.write(playerRights) in your server. Make sure it is.

Read full topic

item.title: Fixing Something
item.dc:creator: @_mpire £mpire
item.description:
@_mpire wrote:

In my client there is this

if(k == 12) { loginMessage1 = "You need a members account to login to this world."; loginMessage2 = "Please subscribe, or use a different world."; return; }

How could i make my server make them get that message?

i already got

if (playerIsMember > 3) {

now i need to get them to get that message?
